pages.text: The $(major)Meaty/$ Gene allows the entity to be $(minor)Sheared for a Raw Porkchop/$. If a player has it, they can $(minor)shear themselves/$ by sneak right-clicking with Shears.$(br2)This has a configurable cooldown, with the default being 1 minute.
This can be mutated into Meaty 2, which causes the entity to spawn a Cooked Porkchop once every 5 minutes.$(br2)Both Meaty and Meaty 2 $(minor)can be given to mobs/$.
